FuncDef: The display ospf hostname-table command displays information about OSPF dynamic hostnames.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an OSPF process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To facilitate network management, configure dynamic hostnames to identify routers. After you run the hostname command to configure a dynamic hostname for a router, the router generates a router information (RI) Opaque LSA.
After a router receives a RI Opaque LSA, you can run the display ospf hostname-table command on the router to check the mapping between the router ID and the dynamic hostname.
